lab1

类 Student

  • java.lang.Object
    • lab1.Student

  • public class Student
extends java.lang.Object

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Student()
      init the student using the default parameters
      Student(java.lang.String name, int NO)
      init the student using the given name and NO

      • Student

        public Student()
        init the student using the default parameters

      • Student

        public Student(java.lang.String name,
               int NO)
        init the student using the given name and NO
        参数:
        name - the name give to the student
        NO - the No give to the student

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        get the name from the student
        返回:
        you name of the student

      • getNO

        public int getNO()
        get the No from the student
        返回:
        the NO of the student

      • getAverScore

        public double getAverScore()
        get the averscore from the student
        返回:
        the averscore of the student

      • setName

        public void setName(java.lang.String name)
        change the name of the student
        参数:
        name - new the name give to the student

      • setNO

        public void setNO(int NO)
        change the NO of the student
        参数:
        NO - the new NO give to the student

      • addCourse

        public boolean addCourse(java.lang.String NO,
                         java.lang.String name,
                         int hour,
                         double score)
        add a course to the student.succeed return ture,else return false
        参数:
        NO - the course NO give to the student
        name - the course name give to the student
        hour - the course hour give to the student
        score - the course score give to the student
        返回:
        succeed return true,else return false

      • delCourse

        public boolean delCourse(java.lang.String NO)
        Delete a course at a designated spot.
        参数:
        NO - the NO of the course you delete
        返回:
        if successfully deleted return true,else return false

      • updateCourse

        public boolean updateCourse(java.lang.String NO,
                            double score)
        change a course at a designated spot.
        参数:
        NO - the NO of the course you change
        score - the score of the course you change
        返回:
        if fail to find the course return false,else return true

      • printReport

        public void printReport()
        print all the information of the student

      • printReport

        public void printReport(java.lang.String NO)
        print the report information by its NO
        参数:
        NO - the NO of the course you print
